question: What will be the apparent frequency when the both source of the sound and listener move in the same direction with same velocity?
option1: it will be more than the actual frequency
option2: it will be less than the actual frequency
option3: it will be equal to the actual frequency
answer: it will be equal to the actual frequency
explanation: When both moves in the same direction with same velocity n' = n, i.e. there will be no Doppler effect because relative motion between source and listener is zero.
